participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Creative and thoughtful, Alex finds joy in gaming and caring for their pets.
participant_1.background: I'm passionate about playing video games and spending time with my dogs. I am not sure how my family would react if I told them I was gay, but I would hope they would be supportive. My pets are a constant source of comfort and love. I type one handed. I'm active and enjoy the outdoors, but my schedule can be hectic.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Nurturing and artistic, Jordan values family and enjoys creating a cozy atmosphere.
participant_2.background: I enjoy listening to jazz music when I make my own coffee. I made a lot of changes to my diet and exercise habits and I'm proud of my progress. I take care of my mother and father. I once wrote a biography of my favorite actor. My favorite movie is Titanic.

content.text: I love playing video games and spending time with my dogs.
I love making my own coffee and listening to jazz music.
My dogs are a constant source of comfort and love.
I take care of my parents and I'm proud of my progress.
I'm active and enjoy the outdoors, but my schedule can be hectic.
I've made a lot of changes to my diet and exercise habits.
I'm not sure how my family would react if I told them I was gay, but I would hope they would be supportive.
I wrote a biography of my favorite actor.
What's your favorite part of the movie?
